Package org.jvault.annotation

Annotation Interface BeanArea

@API @Target(TYPE) @Retention(RUNTIME) public @interface BeanArea
Meta-information used when creating a VaultFactoryBuildInfoExtensiblePoint using a class.
It can be created by passing the class marked as BeanArea as a parameter of the constructor of AnnotationVaultFactoryBuildInfo.

Example. 
 new AnnotationVaultFactoryBuildInfo(SomeBeanAreaMarked.class)

A field marked as BeanWire in a class marked as BeanArea is created as a InternalBean.

Example. 
 @BeanArea
 public final class BeanAreaConfig{ @BeanWire private Foo foo; }
Since:
0.1
See Also:
  • BeanWire
  • InternalBean
